sections.heading: Act; exemptions.The following are exempt from the Postsecondary Institution Act:(1) Any institution or organization which offers education or instruction and which is licensed and regulated solely by an agency of the federal government with respect to curriculum and qualifications of instructional s
sections.text: Act; exemptions.The following are exempt from the Postsecondary Institution Act:(1) Any institution or organization which offers education or instruction and which is licensed and regulated solely by an agency of the federal government with respect to curriculum and qualifications of instructional staff; or(2) Any private postsecondary career school as defined in the Private Postsecondary Career School Act, except for purposes of interstate reciprocity agreements for the provision of postsecondary distance education across state boundaries entered into and administered pursuant to subdivisions (5) and (6) of section 85-2405.SourceLaws 2011, LB637, ยง 7;Laws 2014, LB967, ยง 28.Cross ReferencesPrivate Postsecondary Career School Act, see section 85-1601.
